text.0: The viral video showing damaged stores in Osun Mall was not recorded during last year's anti-xenophobia outrage. There is no record of such a protest taking place in Osun State in that period. Read the #FactCheck here: https://t.co/JrbjJnajEN #DudawaChecks #EndSARS
text.1: Contrary to popular claims on Twitter, deposit of gold in Zamfara State belongs to the federal government, not the state. Read the fact check here: https://t.co/164UM4vP00 #DubawaChecks
text.2: Dubawa stands with young Nigerians in their peaceful protests to #EndSARS . We are committed to this cause and contribute to it by fact-checking claims about the movement. Below is a thread of fact-checks we have done concerning the #EndSARS protests:
text.3:
The claim that the UN has to intervene in any country where a protest lasts 30 days is false. Read this fact-check and many more in our newsletter here: https://t.co/REQHWV8BBv
Subscribe to our weekly newsletter here: https://t.co/skRQePsBWI
#DubawaChecks #FactCheck
